message: Let's be fair and split the money 60/40.  I think this is a good deal for you to accept now.
I think we can both do better. Let's split the money 60/40 in my favor this time. It's a fair deal, considering we both lose money each round we don't agree.

Bob, I understand you want a larger share, but your previous offer wasn't fair given the decreasing value. I'm proposing a compromise at 55/45. We both lose significantly if we keep playing this game.

Alice,  I'm willing to compromise. I'll take 55% of the money and you can have 45%. This is a fair offer given the current value of the money, and it's better than both of us getting nothing if we keep playing.
